text: Lottia filosa is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lottiidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== The shell can grow to be 20 mm in length. ==Distribution== It can be found off of Mexico to Colombia and off of the Galapagos Islands. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Lottiidae Category:Gastropods described in 1865
title: Lottia filosa
